alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duval County through 415 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Caroline, or near Arlington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craig Field, Little Talbot Island and Fort Caroline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
